attributes.action: Provide a 'Paedophile Register' for public viewing in every police station in Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Provide a 'Paedophile Register' for public viewing in every police station in Britain. The British people have the right to keep their children safe from harm and make their communities safer places for their children and all people to live in.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
